input.sentences: as the crowd settles in for tonight 's hockey game .
the fans start showing their support for their teams .
a fan decides to take his enthusiasm to the next level .
as the game continued on the two teams battled for the puck .
the crazy fan from before is now starting to fight with other fans in the stands .
output.sentences: Tonight settles our bet as to which hockey team is the greatest.
We're wearing our colors to show support for our favorite team, even before they start.
This fan is showing an astronomical level of enthusiasm.
The puck is on the ice and the teams start the game.
Fights starting in the stands is not uncommon, because the tensions are running so high.
